item.title: The free WooCommerce WordPress plugin has reached 4 million downloads
item.description:
WooThemes, a developer of WordPress themes, plugins, and shopping cart features, announced that its WooCommerce WordPress plugin has been downloaded over 4 million times. WooCommerce is WooThemes’ free flagship product, officially partnered with companies like Amazon, Mastercard, and PayPal. Source: WooThemes website. WooCommerce enables businesses to operate e-commerce sites using WordPress as their content management system. WooThemes uses a freemium model. The basic plugin and some add-ons are free, while more advanced extensions and themes require payment...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-free-woocommerce-wordpress-plugin-has-reached-4-million-downloads/
